trans-unit.source: SVG only. The element can be the target of a mouse event when the visibility property is set to visible and the mouse cursor is over either the interior (i.e., fill) or the perimeter (i.e., stroke) of the element. The values of the fill and stroke do not affect event processing.
trans-unit.target: 仅限SVG。当 visibility 属性设置为 visible 并且鼠标光标位于元素的内部（即，填充）或外围（即，笔触）上方时，该元素可以是鼠标事件的目标。 fill 和 stroke 的值不影响事件处理。

trans-unit.source: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a mouse event when the visibility property is set to visible and when the mouse cursor is over the interior (i.e., 'fill') of the element and the fill property is set to a value other than none, or when the mouse cursor is over the perimeter (i.e., 'stroke') of the element and the stroke property is set to a value other than none.
trans-unit.target: 仅限SVG。仅当 visibility 属性设置为 visible 且鼠标光标位于元素的内部（即“填充”）且 fill 属性设置为除 none 之外的其他值时，该元素才可以是鼠标事件的目标。，或者当鼠标光标悬停在元素的外围（即'stroke'）上，并且 stroke 属性设置为 none 以外的值时。

trans-unit.source: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a mouse event when the visibility property is set to visible and when the mouse cursor is over the interior (i.e., fill) of the element. The value of the fill property does not affect event processing.
trans-unit.target: 仅限SVG。仅当 visibility 属性设置为 visible 且鼠标光标在元素的内部（即填充）上方时，该元素才可以是鼠标事件的目标。 fill 属性的值不影响事件处理。

trans-unit.source: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a mouse event when the visibility property is set to visible and when the mouse cursor is over the perimeter (i.e., stroke) of the element. The value of the stroke property does not affect event processing.
trans-unit.target: 仅限SVG。仅当 visibility 属性设置为 visible 且鼠标光标在元素的外围（即笔触）上时，该元素才可以是鼠标事件的目标。 stroke 属性的值不影响事件处理。

trans-unit.source: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a mouse event when the mouse cursor is over the interior (i.e., 'fill') of the element and the fill property is set to a value other than none, or when the mouse cursor is over the perimeter (i.e., 'stroke') of the element and the stroke property is set to a value other than none. The value of the visibility property does not affect event processing.
trans-unit.target: 仅限SVG。仅当鼠标光标悬停在元素的内部（即“填充”）并且 fill 属性设置为除 none 之外的值时，或者当鼠标光标悬停在鼠标事件的上方时，该元素才能成为鼠标事件的目标。元素的边界（即“笔触”）和 stroke 属性设置为 none 以外的值。 visibility 属性的值不影响事件处理。

trans-unit.source: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a mouse event when the pointer is over the interior (i.e., fill) of the element. The values of the fill and visibility properties do not affect event processing.
trans-unit.target: 仅限SVG。当指针位于元素内部（即填充）上方时，该元素只能是鼠标事件的目标。 fill 和 visibility 属性的值不影响事件处理。

trans-unit.source: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a mouse event when the pointer is over the interior (i.e., fill) or the perimeter (i.e., stroke) of the element. The values of the fill, stroke and visibility properties do not affect event processing.
trans-unit.target: 仅限SVG。仅当指针位于元素的内部（即填充）或外围（即笔触）上方时，该元素才能成为鼠标事件的目标。 fill ， stroke 和 visibility 属性的值不影响事件处理。

trans-unit.source: SVG only. The element can only be the target of a mouse event when the pointer is over the perimeter (i.e., stroke) of the element. The values of the stroke and visibility properties do not affect event processing.
trans-unit.target: 仅限SVG。仅当指针位于元素的外围（即笔触）上时，该元素才能成为鼠标事件的目标。 stroke 和 visibility 属性的值不影响事件处理。

trans-unit.source: Sadly, not at present. The anonymous boxes that make up your columns can’t be targeted in any way, making it isn’t possible to change a box's background color or have one column larger than the others. Perhaps in future versions of the specification it might be. For now, however, we are able to change the spacing and add lines between columns.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，目前还没有。组成列的匿名框无法以任何方式定位，因此无法更改框的背景色或使一列的列比其他列大。也许在规范的将来版本中可能是。但是，目前，我们可以更改间距并在列之间添加线。

trans-unit.source: Safari 1.1 to 3.2 only supports one text-shadow (displays the first shadow of a comma-separated list and ignores the rest). Safari 4.0 (WebKit 528) and later support multiple text-shadows.
trans-unit.target: Safari 1.1 至 3.2 只支持一个文本阴影(显示逗号分隔的列表的第一个阴影,并忽略其余部分)。Safari 4.0 (WebKit 528)及以后的版本支持多个文本阴影。

trans-unit.source: Safari 4 was supporting an experimental -webkit-gradient(linear,…) function. It is more limited than the later standard version: you cannot specify both a position and an angle like in linear-gradient(). This old outdated syntax is still supported for compatibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: Safari 4支持实验性的 -webkit-gradient(linear,…) 函数。它比以后的标准版本有更多限制：不能像 linear-gradient() 那样同时指定位置和角度。出于兼容性目的，仍支持此旧的过时语法。

trans-unit.source: Safari 4 was supporting an experimental -webkit-gradient(linear,…) function. It is more limited than the later standard version: you cannot specify both a position and an angle like in repeating-linear-gradient(). This old outdated syntax is still supported for compatibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: Safari 4支持实验性的 -webkit-gradient(linear,…) 函数。它比以后的标准版本有更多限制：您不能像在 repeating-linear-gradient() 中那样同时指定位置和角度。出于兼容性目的，仍支持此旧的过时语法。

trans-unit.source: Safari 4 was supporting an experimental -webkit-gradient(radial,…) function. This old outdated syntax is still supported for compatibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: Safari 4支持实验性的 -webkit-gradient(radial,…) 函数。出于兼容性目的，仍支持此旧的过时语法。

trans-unit.source: Safari currently has the two value syntax in the wrong order, the first value being inline the second block. See bug #191865.
trans-unit.target: Safari当前使用错误的顺序的两个值语法，第一个值内联第二个块。请参阅错误＃191865。

trans-unit.source: Safari doesn't support text-decoration-style.
trans-unit.target: Safari不支持 text-decoration-style 。

trans-unit.source: Safari has an issue whereby unordered lists with a list-style value of none applied to them will not be recognized as a list in the accessibility tree. To address this, add a zero-width space as pseudo-content before each list item to ensure the list is recognized properly. This ensures the design is unaffected by the bug fix and that list items are not improperly described.
trans-unit.target: Safari存在一个问题，即在 list-style 未应用 none 列表样式值的无序列表将不会被视为可访问性树中的列表。要解决此问题，请在每个列表项之前添加一个零宽度的空格作为伪内容，以确保正确识别该列表。这样可以确保设计不受错误修复的影响，并且不会对列表项进行不正确的描述。

trans-unit.source: Safari implements a non-standard, prefixed, version of ruby-position, -webkit-ruby-position: it has two properties: before and after (both equivalent, for ltr and rtl scripts to the standard over value used with ruby-align: start).
trans-unit.target: Safari浏览器工具非标准，前缀，版本 ruby-position ， -webkit-ruby-position ：它具有两个属性： before 和 after （两当量，对于LTR和RTL脚本标准 over 与所用值 ruby-align: start ）。

trans-unit.source: Safari implements an earlier proposal for setting height to an intrinsic height: the keywords intrinsic (instead of max-content), and min-intrinsic (instead of min-content). There is no equivalent for fill-available or fit-content.
trans-unit.target: Safari实施了一个较早的建议，将高度设置为固有高度：关键字 intrinsic （代替 max-content ）和 min-intrinsic （代替 min-content ）。没有任何等效的 fill-available 或 fit-content 。

trans-unit.source: Safari implements an earlier proposal for setting width to an intrinsic width: the keywords intrinsic (instead of max-content), and min-intrinsic (instead of min-content). There is no equivalent for fill-available or fit-content.
trans-unit.target: Safari实施了一个较早的建议，将宽度设置为固有宽度：关键字 intrinsic （代替 max-content ）和 min-intrinsic （代替 min-content ）。没有任何等效的 fill-available 或 fit-content 。

trans-unit.source: Safari incorrectly interprets clip: auto as clip: rect(auto, auto, auto, auto).
trans-unit.target: Safari错误地将 clip: auto 解释为 clip: rect(auto, auto, auto, auto) 。

trans-unit.source: Safari supports the collapse value only on <tr>, <thead>, <tbody>, and <tfoot>, but not on <col> and <colgroup> elements.
trans-unit.target: Safari仅在 <tr> ， <thead> ， <tbody> 和 <tfoot> 上支持折叠值，但在 <col> 和 <colgroup> 元素上不支持折叠值。

trans-unit.source: Safari treats auto as optimizeSpeed. See WebKit bug 41363.
trans-unit.target: Safari将 auto 视为 optimizeSpeed 。请参阅WebKit错误41363。

trans-unit.source: Safari treats visibility: collapse like hidden, leaving a white gap.
trans-unit.target: Safari对待 visibility: collapse 像 hidden 一样崩溃，留下空白。

trans-unit.source: Saturates the input image. The value of amount defines the proportion of the conversion. A value of 0% is completely un-saturated. A value of 100% leaves the input unchanged. Other values are linear multipliers on the effect. Values of amount over 100% are allowed, providing super-saturated results. The lacuna value for interpolation is 1.
trans-unit.target: 使输入图像饱和。的值 amount 定义了转换的比例。的值 0% 是完全不饱和的。值为 100% 会使输入保持不变。其他值是效果的线性乘数。允许值超过 100% ，提供超饱和结果。插值的空白值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: Scales the image as large as possible without stretching the image. If the proportions of the image differ from the element, it is cropped either vertically or horizontally so that no empty space remains.
trans-unit.target: 在不拉伸图像的情况下,尽可能地将图像放大。如果图像的比例与元素不同,则在垂直或水平方向上对图像进行裁剪,使其不留空隙。

trans-unit.source: Scrolling elements containing fixed or sticky content can cause performance and accessibility issues. As a user scrolls, the browser must repaint the sticky or fixed content in a new location. Depending on the content needing to be repainted, the browser performance, and the device's processing speed, the browser may not be able to manage repaints at 60
trans-unit.target: 包含 fixed 或 sticky 内容的滚动元素可能会导致性能和可访问性问题。当用户滚动时，浏览器必须在新位置重新绘制粘性或固定内容。根据需要重新粉刷的内容，浏览器性能以及设备的处理速度，浏览器可能无法在60岁时管理重新粉刷。

trans-unit.source: See <color> values for possible keywords and notations. If not specified, the color depends on the browser. In Gecko (Firefox), Presto (Opera) and Trident (Internet Explorer), the value of the color property is used. On the other hand, WebKit's shadow is transparent and therefore useless if <color> is omitted.
trans-unit.target: 有关可能的关键字和符号，请参见 <color> 值。如果未指定，则颜色取决于浏览器。在Gecko（Firefox），Presto（Opera）和Trident（Internet Explorer）中，使用 color 属性的值。另一方面，WebKit的阴影是透明的，因此如果省略 <color> 则无用。

trans-unit.source: Selects a font classified as oblique, and additionally specifies a range of allowable angle for the slant of the text. Note that a range is only supported when the font-style is oblique; for font-style: normal or italic, no second value is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 选择分类为“ oblique 的字体，并另外指定文本倾斜角度的允许角度范围。需要注意的是，当一个范围只支持 font-style 是 oblique ; 对于 font-style: normal 或 italic ，不允许使用第二个值。

trans-unit.source: Selects a font classified as oblique, and additionally specifies an angle for the slant of the text.
trans-unit.target: 选择分类为“ oblique 的字体，并另外指定文本倾斜的角度。

trans-unit.source: Selects a font classified as oblique, and additionally specifies an angle for the slant of the text. If one or more oblique faces are available in the chosen font family, the one that most closely matches the specified angle is chosen. If no oblique faces are available, the browser will synthesize an oblique version of the font by slanting a normal face by the specified amount. Valid values are degree values of -90–90 inclusive. If an angle is not specified, an angle of 14 degrees is used. Positive values are slanted to the end of the line, while negative values are slanted towards the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 选择分类为“ oblique 的字体，并另外指定文本倾斜的角度。如果所选字体系列中有一个或多个斜面，则选择与指定角度最接近的斜面。如果没有可用的倾斜面，则浏览器将通过将正常面倾斜指定量来合成字体的倾斜版本。有效值为度值-90-90（含）。如果未指定角度，则使用14度角。正值倾斜到行尾，而负值倾斜到行尾。

trans-unit.source: Selects a font that is classified as italic. If no italic version of the face is available, one classified as oblique is used instead. If neither is available, the style is artificially simulated.
trans-unit.target: 选择分类为 italic 的字体。如果没有可用的斜体，则改用 oblique 。如果两者均不可用，则对样式进行人工模拟。

trans-unit.source: Selects a font that is classified as normal within a font-family.
trans-unit.target: 选择在 font-family 中被归类为 normal 字体的字体。

trans-unit.source: Selects a font that is classified as oblique. If no oblique version of the face is available, one classified as italic is used instead. If neither is available, the style is artificially simulated.
trans-unit.target: 选择分类为 oblique 字体。如果没有可用的斜脸，则改用 italic 。如果两者均不可用，则对样式进行人工模拟。

trans-unit.source: Selects all elements that have the given class attribute.
trans-unit.target: 选择具有给定 class 属性的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Selects all elements that match the given node name.
trans-unit.target: 选择所有符合给定节点名称的元素。

trans-unit.source: Selects all elements. Optionally, it may be restricted to a specific namespace or to all namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 选择所有元素。可以选择限制在特定的命名空间或所有的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Selects an element based on the value of its id attribute. There should be only one element with a given ID in a document.
trans-unit.target: 根据其 id 属性的值选择一个元素。文档中应只有一个具有给定ID的元素。

trans-unit.source: Selects elements based on the value of the given attribute.
trans-unit.target: 根据给定属性的值选择元素。

trans-unit.source: Selects the normal version of the font-family.
trans-unit.target: 选择正常版本的字体家族。

trans-unit.source: Self alignment
trans-unit.target: 自我调整

trans-unit.source: Semi Bold (Demi Bold)
trans-unit.target: 半粗体(半粗体)

trans-unit.source: Separating two or more components by a double bar, ||, means that all entities are options: at least one of them must be present, and they may appear in any order. Typically this is used to define the different values of a shorthand property.
trans-unit.target: 用双杠将两个或多个组件分开， || ，表示所有实体都是选项：必须存在至少一个实体，并且它们可以按任何顺序出现。通常，它用于定义速记属性的不同值。

trans-unit.source: Separating two or more components, by a double ampersand, &&, means that all these entities are mandatory but may appear in any order.
trans-unit.target: 分离两个或多个组件，由一个双符号， && ，意味着所有这些实体强制性的，但可能会出现在任何顺序。

trans-unit.source: Separating two or more entities by a single bar, |, means that all entities are exclusive options: exactly one of these options must be present. This is typically used to separate a list of possible keywords.
trans-unit.target: 用单杠分隔两个或更多实体， | 。，表示所有实体都是互斥选项：必须存在这些选项之一。这通常用于分隔可能的关键字列表。

trans-unit.source: Sequences of white space are collapsed. Lines are broken at newline characters, at <br>, and as necessary to fill line boxes.
trans-unit.target: 空白序列被折叠。行在 <br> 处以换行符断开，并根据需要填充行框。

trans-unit.source: Sequences of white space are collapsed. Newline characters in the source are handled the same as other white space. Lines are broken as necessary to fill line boxes.
trans-unit.target: 白色空间的序列被折叠。源文件中的换行字符与其他空白字符的处理方式相同。根据需要断行,以填充行框。

trans-unit.source: Sequences of white space are preserved. Lines are broken at newline characters, at <br>, and as necessary to fill line boxes.
trans-unit.target: 保留空白序列。行在 <br> 处以换行符断开，并根据需要填充行框。

trans-unit.source: Sequences of white space are preserved. Lines are only broken at newline characters in the source and at <br> elements.
trans-unit.target: 保留空白序列。行仅在源和 <br> 元素中的换行符处断开。

trans-unit.source: Sets grid-template-areas to the strings listed, grid-template-rows to the track sizes following each string (filling in auto for any missing sizes), and splicing in the named lines defined before/after each size, and grid-template-columns to the track listing specified after the slash (or none, if not specified).
trans-unit.target: 将 grid-template-areas 设置为列出的字符串，将 grid-template-rows 设置为每个字符串之后的轨道尺寸（ auto 填充任何丢失的尺寸），并拼接在每个尺寸之前/之后定义的命名行，以及 grid-template-columns 到斜杠后指定的曲目列表（如果未指定，则为 none ）。

trans-unit.source: Sets grid-template-rows and grid-template-columns to the specified values, and sets grid-template-areas to none.

trans-unit.target: 设置应用于选定元素的属性值与其父元素的属性值相同。

trans-unit.source: Sets the property value applied to a selected element to be the same as the value set for that element in the browser's default style sheet. If no value is set by the browser's default style sheet and the property is naturally inherited, then the property value is set to inherit instead.
trans-unit.target: 将应用于所选元素的属性值设置为与浏览器默认样式表中为该元素设置的值相同。如果浏览器的默认样式表未设置任何值，并且自然地继承了该属性，则将属性值设置为 inherit 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the repetition of the mask image. See mask-repeat.
trans-unit.target: 设置蒙版图像的重复。参见 mask-repeat 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the mask image. See mask-size.
trans-unit.target: 设置遮罩图像的尺寸。参见 mask-size 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the style of the border. Defaults to none if absent. See border-style.
trans-unit.target: 设置边框的样式。如果不存在，则默认为 none 。参见 border-style 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the style of the line used for the decoration, such as solid, wavy, or dashed.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于装饰的线条的样式，例如 solid ， wavy 或 dashed 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the style of the outline. Defaults to none if absent. See outline-style.
trans-unit.target: 设置轮廓的样式。如果不存在，则默认为 none 。请参阅 outline-style 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the thickness of the border. Defaults to medium if absent. See border-width.
trans-unit.target: 设置边框的粗细。如果不存在，默认为 medium 。请参阅 border-width 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the thickness of the outline. Defaults to medium if absent. See outline-width.
trans-unit.target: 设置轮廓的厚度。如果不存在，默认为 medium 。参见 outline-width 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the threshold used for extracting a shape from an image. The shape is defined by the pixels whose alpha value is greater than the threshold. Values outside the range 0.0 (fully transparent) to 1.0 (fully opaque) are clamped to this range.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于从图像中提取形状的阈值。形状是由alpha值大于阈值的像素定义的。0.0(完全透明)到1.0(完全不透明)范围外的值被限制在这个范围内。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the font-variant-ligatures to none and the values of the other longhand property as normal, their initial value.
trans-unit.target: 将 font-variant-ligatures 的值设置为 none ，并将另一个longhand属性的值设置为 normal ，即它们的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Sets up an auto-flow by setting the column tracks explicitly via the grid-template-columns property (and the grid-template-rows property to none) and specifying how to auto-repeat the row tracks via grid-auto-rows (and setting grid-auto-columns to auto). grid-auto-flow is also set to row accordingly, with dense if it’s specified.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 grid-template-columns 属性（将 grid-template-rows 属性设置为 none ）显式设置列轨道并指定如何通过 grid-auto-rows 自动重复行轨道来设置自动流（和将 grid-auto-columns 设置为 auto ）。 grid-auto-flow 也相应地设置为 row ，如果指定则 dense 。

trans-unit.source: Sets up an auto-flow by setting the row tracks explicitly via the grid-template-rows property (and the grid-template-columns property to none) and specifying how to auto-repeat the column tracks via grid-auto-columns (and setting grid-auto-rows to auto). grid-auto-flow is also set to column accordingly, with dense if it’s specified.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 grid-template-rows 属性（将 grid-template-columns 属性设置为 none ）显式设置行轨迹，并指定如何通过 grid-auto-columns 自动重复列轨迹来设置自动流（和将 grid-auto-rows 设置为 auto ）。 grid-auto-flow 也相应地设置为 column ，如果指定，则为 dense 。

trans-unit.source: Setting flex: initial resets the item to the initial values of Flexbox. This is the same as flex: 0 1 auto. In this case the value of flex-grow is 0, so items will not grow larger than their flex-basis size. The value of flex-shrink is 1, so items can shrink if they need to rather than overflowing. The value of flex-basis is auto. Items will either use any size set on the item in the main dimension, or they will get their size from the content size.
trans-unit.target: 设置 flex: initial 将项目重置为Flexbox的初始值。这与 flex: 0 1 auto 。在这种情况下， flex-grow 的值为0，因此项目的增长不会超过其 flex-basis 的大小。的价值 flex-shrink 为1，因此，如果他们需要，而不是溢出项目可以缩小。 flex-basis 的值是 auto 。项目将使用在主维度上项目上设置的任何大小，或者从内容大小中获取它们的大小。

trans-unit.source: Setting overflow: auto created a new
trans-unit.target: 设置 overflow: auto 创建新的

trans-unit.source: Setting CSS properties to specific values is the core function of the CSS language. A property and value pair is called a declaration, and any CSS engine calculates which declarations apply to every single element of a page in order to appropriately lay it out, and to style it.
trans-unit.target: 将CSS属性设置为特定值是CSS语言的核心功能。属性和值对称为声明，任何CSS引擎都会计算哪些声明适用于页面的每个元素，以便对其进行适当的布局和样式设置。

trans-unit.source: Setting a maximum size for an label and input
trans-unit.target: 设置标签和输入的最大尺寸

trans-unit.source: Setting a minimum and max size for a font
trans-unit.target: 设置字体的最小和最大尺寸

trans-unit.source: Setting a minimum size for a font
trans-unit.target: 设置字体的最小尺寸

trans-unit.source: Setting a threshold
trans-unit.target: 设置阈值

trans-unit.source: Setting auto margins, using margin-right or margin-left however, or absolutely positioning items using the top, right, bottom and left offsets would not honor writing modes. In the next guide, we will look further into this interaction between CSS grid layout, box alignment and writing modes. This will be important to understand, if you develop sites that are then displayed in multiple languages, or if you want to mix languages or writing modes in a design.
trans-unit.target: 但是，设置自动页边距，使用 margin-right 或 margin-left 或使用 top ， right ， bottom 和 left 偏移量绝对定位项目将不支持书写模式。在下一个指南中，我们将进一步研究CSS网格布局，框对齐和书写模式之间的这种相互作用。如果您开发的网站随后会以多种语言显示，或者要在设计中混合使用多种语言或编写模式，那么理解这一点将非常重要。

trans-unit.source: Setting multiple animation property values
trans-unit.target: 设置多个动画属性值

trans-unit.source: Setting perspective
trans-unit.target: 树立观点

trans-unit.source: Setting the animation property is easy; simply update its value in the style collection. However, adding keyframes is trickier, since they're not defined using traditional CSS syntax (which makes them more flexible, but harder to define from script).
trans-unit.target: 设置动画属性很简单,只需在样式集合中更新其值即可。然而,添加关键帧是比较棘手的,因为它们不是用传统的CSS语法定义的(这使得它们更灵活,但更难从脚本中定义)。

trans-unit.source: Setting the font size in pixel values (px) is a good choice when you need pixel accuracy. A px value is static. This is an OS-independent and cross-browser way of literally telling the browsers to render the letters at exactly the number of pixels in height that you specified. The results may vary slightly across browsers, as they may use different algorithms to achieve a similar effect.
trans-unit.target: 当需要像素精度时，以像素值（ px ）设置字体大小是一个不错的选择。px值是静态的。这是一种独立于操作系统且跨浏览器的方式，从字面上告诉浏览器以您指定的高度的像素数为单位呈现字母。不同浏览器的结果可能略有不同，因为它们可能使用不同的算法来达到类似的效果。

trans-unit.source: Shorthand properties try not to force a specific order for the values of the properties they replace. trans-unit.source: Since text that has been scaled down to fit a mobile screen may be very small, many mobile browsers apply a text inflation algorithm to enlarge the text to make it more readable. When an element containing text uses 100% of the screen's width, the algorithm increases its text size, but without modifying the layout. The text-size-adjust property allows web authors to disable or modify this behavior, as web pages designed with small screens in mind do not need it.
trans-unit.target: 由于已按比例缩小以适合移动屏幕的文本可能很小，因此许多移动浏览器都使用文本填充算法来放大文本以使其更具可读性。当包含文本的元素使用屏幕宽度的100％时，该算法将增加其文本大小，但不修改布局。在 text-size-adjust 属性允许网页制作者禁用或修改此行为，如网页设计时考虑到小屏幕并不需要它。

trans-unit.source: Since the timing of the animation is defined in the CSS style that configures the animation, keyframes use a <percentage> to indicate the time during the animation sequence at which they take place. 0% indicates the first moment of the animation sequence, while 100% indicates the final state of the animation. Because these two times are so important, they have special aliases: from and to. Both are optional. If from/0% or to/100% is not specified, the browser starts or finishes the animation using the computed values of all attributes.
trans-unit.target: 由于动画的时间安排是通过配置动画的CSS样式定义的，因此关键帧使用 <percentage> 来指示动画序列中发生动画的时间。 0％指示动画序列的第一时刻，而100％指示动画的最终状态。由于这两次非常重要，因此它们具有特殊的别名： from 和 to 。两者都是可选的。如果 from / 0% 或 to / 100% 没有指定，浏览器启动或使用完的所有属性的计算的值的动画。

trans-unit.source: Slant (represented by the slnt tag), or as it's often referred to, 'oblique' — is different to true italics in that it changes the angle of the letterforms but doesn’t perform any kind of character substitution. It is also variable, in that it is expressed as a numeric range. This allows the font to be varied anywhere along that axis. The allowed range is generally 0 (upright) to 20 degrees — any number value along that range can be supplied, so the font can be slanted just a tiny bit. However, any value from -90–90 degrees is valid.
trans-unit.target: 倾斜（由 slnt 标签表示），或者通常被称为“倾斜”，与真正的斜体不同，因为它会改变字母形状的角度，但不执行任何类型的字符替换。它也是可变的，因为它表示为数字范围。这允许字体沿该轴的任何位置变化。允许的范围通常是0（垂直）到20度-可以提供该范围内的任何数字值，因此字体可以稍微倾斜一点。但是，-90–90度之间的任何值都是有效的。

trans-unit.source: So far we have been aligning the items, or an individual item inside the area defined by the flex-container. If you have a wrapped multiple-line flex container then you might also want to use the align-content property to control the distribution of space between the rows. In the specification this is described as packing flex lines.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们一直在将这些项目或单个项目对齐到flex容器定义的区域内。如果具有包装的多行flex容器，则可能还需要使用 align-content 属性来控制行之间的空间分布。在规范中将其描述为包装挠性线。

trans-unit.source: So far we have looked at the behaviour when our flex-direction is row, and while working in a language written top to bottom. This means that the main axis runs along the row horizontally, and our cross axis alignment moves the items up and down.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们已经研究了当 flex-direction 为 row 且使用从上到下编写的语言工作时的行为。这意味着主轴水平地沿着行行，并且我们的交叉轴对齐使项目上下移动。

trans-unit.source: So far, other than items we have specifically placed, grid is always progressing forward and keeping items in DOM order. This is generally what you want, if you are laying out a form for example you wouldn’t want the labels and fields to become jumbled up in order to fill in some gap. However sometimes, we are laying things out that don’t have a logical order and we would like to create a layout that doesn’t have gaps in it.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，除了我们专门放置的项目以外，grid一直在向前发展并保持DOM顺序。通常，这就是您想要的，例如，如果要布置一个表单，则不希望将标签和字段弄乱以填补一些空白。但是有时候，我们正在布置没有逻辑顺序的事物，我们希望创建一个没有空隙的布局。

trans-unit.source: So that user agents can avoid retrieving resources for unsupported media types, authors may specify media-dependent @import rules. These conditional imports specify comma-separated media queries after the URL. In the absence of any media query, the import is unconditional. Specifying all for the medium has the same effect.
trans-unit.target: 为了使用户代理可以避免检索不受支持的媒体类型的资源，作者可以指定依赖于媒体的 @import 规则。这些条件导入在URL后面指定逗号分隔的媒体查询。在没有任何媒体查询的情况下，导入是无条件的。为介质指定 all 具有相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: So where flex-grow deals with adding available space, flex-shrink manages taking away space to make boxes fit into their container without overflowing.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在 flex-grow 处理增加可用空间的地方， flex-shrink 管理占用空间以使盒子适合其容器而不会溢出。

trans-unit.source: Some browsers let users modify the user-agent stylesheet. Although some constraints on user-agent stylesheets are set by the HTML specification, browsers still have a lot of latitude: that means that significant differences exist from one browser to another. To simplify the development process, Web developers often use a CSS reset style sheet, forcing common properties values to a known state before beginning to make alterations to suit their specific needs.
trans-unit.target: 一些浏览器允许用户修改用户代理样式表。虽然HTML规范对用户代理样式表设置了一些限制,但浏览器仍然有很大的自由度:这意味着不同的浏览器之间存在很大的差异。为了简化开发过程,Web开发人员经常使用CSS重置样式表,在开始进行修改以适应他们的特定需求之前,强制将通用属性值恢复到已知状态。

trans-unit.source: Some languages have digraphs that are always capitalized together, like the IJ in Dutch. In these cases, both letters of the digraph should be matched by the ::first-letter pseudo-element. (This is poorly supported by browsers; see the browser compatibility table below.)

trans-unit.target: 一些布局模型（例如 table 和 ruby 具有复杂的内部结构，其子代和后代可以担当几种不同的角色。该页面定义了那些“内部”显示值，它们仅在该特定布局模式下才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Some layout models such as table and ruby have a complex internal structure, with several different roles that their children and descendants can fill. This section defines those "internal" display values, which only have meaning within that particular layout mode.
trans-unit.target: 一些布局模型（例如 table 和 ruby 具有复杂的内部结构，其子代和后代可以担当几种不同的角色。本部分定义了那些“内部”显示值，这些值仅在该特定布局模式下才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Some people have difficulty distinguishing colors. The WCAG 2.0 recommendation strongly advises against using color as the only means of conveying a specific message, action, or result. See Color and color contrast for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有些人难以区分颜色。的WCAG 2.0建议强烈建议不要使用颜色作为传送的特定消息，操作或结果的唯一手段。有关更多信息，请参见颜色和颜色对比度。

trans-unit.source: Something that you will run into when creating shapes from an image is that the image you use must be CORS compatible. An image hosted on the same domain as your site should work, however if your images are hosted on a different domain such as on a CDN you should ensure that they are sending the correct headers to enable them to be used for Shapes. Due to this requirement for CORS compatible images, if you are previewing your file locally without using a local web server, your shape will not work.
trans-unit.target: 从图像创建形状时会遇到的问题是，您使用的图像必须与CORS兼容。与站点位于同一域中的图像应该可以工作，但是，如果图像位于CDN等不同的域中，则应确保它们发送正确的标头，以使其可用于Shapes。由于对CORS兼容图像有此要求，如果在不使用本地Web服务器的情况下在本地预览文件，则形状将无法工作。

trans-unit.source: Something to note as we create this layout is that we haven’t needed to explicitly position every element on the grid at each breakpoint. We have been able to inherit the placement set up for earlier breakpoints – an advantage of working “mobile first”. We are also able to take advantage of grid auto-placement. By keeping elements in a logical order, auto-placement does quite a lot of work for us in placing items onto the grid. In the final example in this guide we will create a layout that entirely relies on auto-placement.
trans-unit.target: 创建此布局时要注意的一点是，我们不需要在每个断点处将网格上的每个元素都明确地定位。我们已经能够继承为较早的断点设置的放置-“移动优先”的优势。我们还能够利用网格自动放置的优势。通过将元素保持在逻辑顺序中，自动放置对我们将项目放置到网格上的工作量很大。在本指南的最后一个示例中，我们将创建一个完全依赖自动放置的布局。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's substance, not just style
trans-unit.target: 有时,它的实质,不只是风格

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you may want to create a media query that depends on multiple conditions. This is where the logical operators come in: not, and, and only. Furthermore, you can combine multiple media queries into a comma-separated list; this allows you to apply the same styles in different situations.
trans-unit.target: 有时您可能想创建一个取决于多个条件的媒体查询。这就是逻辑运算符进来： not ， and ，和 only 。此外，您可以将多个媒体查询合并到一个逗号分隔的列表中；这使您可以在不同情况下应用相同的样式。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you may want to force an item to move below any floated elements. For instance, you may want paragraphs to remain adjacent to floats, but force headings to be on their own line. See clear for examples.
trans-unit.target: 有时，您可能希望强制某项移动到任何浮动元素的下方。例如，您可能希望段落保持与浮点数相邻，但将标题强制成一行。请参阅 clear 示例。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, two adjacent margins are collapsed into one. This article describes the rules that govern when and why this happens, and how to control it.
trans-unit.target: 有时,两个相邻的页边距会折叠成一个。这篇文章描述了管理这种情况发生的时间和原因的规则,以及如何控制它。

trans-unit.source: Specificity

trans-unit.source: Specificity Calculator: An interactive website to test and understand your own CSS rules - https://specificity.keegan.st/
trans-unit.target: 特异性计算器：用于测试和了解您自己的CSS规则的交互式网站-https: //specificity.keegan.st/

trans-unit.source: Specificity is a weight that is applied to a given CSS declaration, determined by the number of each selector type in the matching selector. When multiple declarations have equal specificity, the last declaration found in the CSS is applied to the element. Specificity only applies when the same element is targeted by multiple declarations. As per CSS rules, directly targeted elements will always take precedence over rules which an element inherits from its ancestor.
trans-unit.target: 特异性是应用于给定CSS声明的权重，它由匹配选择器中每种选择器类型的数量决定。当多个声明具有相同的特异性时，将在CSS中找到的最后一个声明应用于该元素。特异性仅在多个声明针对同一元素时适用。根据CSS规则，直接定位的元素将始终优先于元素从其祖先继承的规则。

trans-unit.source: Specificity is based on the form of a selector. In the following case, the selector *[id="foo"] counts as an attribute selector for the purpose of determining the selector's specificity, even though it selects an ID.
trans-unit.target: 特异性基于选择器的形式。在以下情况下，即使选择器 *[id="foo"] 选择了ID，它也仍被视为属性选择器，以决定选择器的特异性。

trans-unit.source: Specified value
trans-unit.target: 指定值

trans-unit.source: Specifies text-shadow as animatable.
trans-unit.target: 将 text-shadow 指定为可动画设置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a CSS shape including circle(), ellipse(), inset(), polygon(), or path().
trans-unit.target: 指定CSS形状，包括 circle() ， ellipse() ， inset() ， polygon() 或 path() 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a <symbol> that is appended to the marker representation. It may be a <string>, <image>, or <custom-ident>.
trans-unit.target: 指定附加到标记表示形式的 <symbol> 。它可以是 <string> ， <image> 或 <custom-ident> 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a <symbol> that is prepended to the marker representation. It may be a <string>, <image>, or <custom-ident>.
trans-unit.target: 指定在标记表示形式之前的 <symbol> 。它可以是 <string> ， <image> 或 <custom-ident> 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the annotation() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. An annotation feature value definition allows only one value: ident1: 2 is valid, but ident2: 2 4 isn't.
trans-unit.target: 指定将与 font-variant-alternates 的 annotation() 功能符号一起使用的功能名称。注释要素值定义仅允许一个值： ident1: 2 有效，而 ident2: 2 4 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the character-variant() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. A character-variant feature value definition allows either one or two values: ident1: 3 maps to cv03=1, and ident2: 2 4 maps to cv02=4, but ident2: 2 4 5 is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 指定将与 font-variant-alternates 的 character-variant() 功能符号一起使用的功能名称。字符变量特征值定义允许一个或两个值： ident1: 3 映射到 cv03=1 ，并且 ident2: 2 4 映射到 cv02=4 ，但是 ident2: 2 4 5 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the ornaments() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. An ornaments feature value definition allows only one value: ident1: 2 is valid, but ident2: 2 4 isn't.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个功能名称，该功能名称将与 font-variant-alternates 的 ornaments() 功能符号一起使用。装饰物特征值定义仅允许一个值： ident1: 2 有效，而 ident2: 2 4 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the styleset() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. A stylset feature value definition allows an unlimited number of values: ident1: 2 4 12 1 maps to the OpenType values ss02, ss04, ss12, and ss01. Note that values higher than 99 are valid, but don't map to any OpenType values and are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 指定将与 font-variant-alternates 的 styleset() 功能符号一起使用的功能名称。样式集特征值定义允许无限数量的值： ident1: 2 4 12 1 映射到OpenType值 ss02 ， ss04 ， ss12 和 ss01 。请注意，大于 99 的值是有效的，但不会映射到任何OpenType值，并且将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the stylistic() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. A stylistic feature value definition allows only one value: ident1: 2 is valid, but ident2: 2 4 isn't.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个功能名称，该功能名称将与 font-variant-alternates 的 stylistic() 功能符号一起使用。样式特征值定义仅允许一个值： ident1: 2 有效，而 ident2: 2 4 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a feature name that will work with the swash() functional notation of font-variant-alternates. A swash feature value definition allows only one value: ident1: 2 is valid, but ident2: 2 4 isn't.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个功能名称，该功能名称将与 font-variant-alternates 的 swash() 功能符号一起使用。 ident1: 2 特征值定义仅允许一个值：ident1：2有效，而 ident2: 2 4 无效。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a function to define how intermediate values for properties are computed. Timing functions determine how intermediate values of the transition are calculated. Most timing functions can be specified by providing the graph of the corresponding function, as defined by four points defining a cubic bezier. You can also choose easing from Easing Functions Cheat Sheet.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个函数来定义如何计算属性的中间值。时序函数确定如何计算过渡的中间值。大多数时序函数可以通过提供相应函数的图来指定，如定义三次方贝塞尔曲线的四个点所定义。您也可以从“ 缓动功能备忘单”中选择缓动。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a more condensed font face than normal, with ultra-condensed as the most condensed.
trans-unit.target: 指定比正常情况下更精简的字面,超精简为最精简。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a more expanded font face than normal, with ultra-expanded as the most expanded.
trans-unit.target: 指定比正常情况下更膨胀的字面,超膨胀为最膨胀。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a name that will be used as the font face value for font properties.
trans-unit.target: 指定将作为字体属性的字面值的名称。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a normal font face.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个正常的字型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a normal font face; each of the longhand properties has an initial value of normal. Longhand properties of font-variant are: font-variant-caps, font-variant-numeric, font-variant-alternates, font-variant-ligatures, and font-variant-east-asian.
trans-unit.target: 指定普通字体；每个长期属性都具有正常的初始值。 font-variant 的长期特性是： font-variant-caps ， font-variant-numeric ， font-variant-alternates ， font-variant-ligatures 和 font-variant-east-asian 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a starting snap-point followed by the interval between all snap-points.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个起始快照点,然后是所有快照点之间的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a symbol that should be prepended to the marker representation. Prefixes are added to the representation in the final stage, so in the final representation of the counter, it comes before the negative sign.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个应在标记表示中加前缀的符号。前缀是在最后阶段添加到表示中的,所以在计数器的最后表示中,它在负号之前。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a system to fall back into if either the specified system is unable to construct the representation of a counter value or if the counter value outside the specified range. If the specified fallback also fails to represent the value, then the fallback style's fallback is used, if one is specified. If there are either no fallback systems described or if the chain of fallback systems are unable to represent a counter value, then it will ultimately fall back to the decimal style.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个系统,如果指定的系统无法构造计数器值的表示,或者如果计数器值在指定的范围之外,则指定回退系统。如果指定的回退系统也不能表示该值,则使用回退样式的回退系统(如果指定了)。如果没有所述的回落系统,或者回落系统链无法表示计数器值,那么最终将回落到十进制样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an external reference consisting of a <url>, followed by an optional hint using the format() function to describe the format of the font resource referenced by that URL. The format hint contains a comma-separated list of format strings that denote well-known font formats. If a user agent doesn't support the specified formats, it skips downloading the font resource. If no format hints are supplied, the font resource is always downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个外部引用，该引用由 <url> 组成，后跟可选的提示，使用 format() 函数描述该URL引用的字体资源的格式。格式提示包含逗号分隔的格式字符串列表，这些字符串表示众所周知的字体格式。如果用户代理不支持指定的格式，它将跳过下载字体资源。如果未提供格式提示，则始终下载字体资源。

trans-unit.source: Specifies behavior that depends on the stylesheet origin to which the declaration belongs:
trans-unit.target: 指定取决于声明所属的样式表来源的行为。

trans-unit.source: Specifies by how far outward, in each direction, the bleed area extends past the page box. Values may be negative, but there may be implementation-specific limits.
trans-unit.target: 指定出血区域在每个方向上向外延伸多远,超过页面框。数值可以是负数,但可能有特定的实施限制。

trans-unit.source: Specifies extra inter-character space in addition to the default space between characters. Values may be negative, but there may be implementation-specific limits. User agents may not further increase or decrease the inter-character space in order to justify text.
trans-unit.target: 除了字符之间的默认间隔外，还指定额外的字符间间隔。值可能为负，但可能存在特定于实现的限制。用户代理不得进一步增加或减少字符间空间以证明文本合理。

trans-unit.source: Specifies extra spacing as a percentage of the affected character’s advance width.
trans-unit.target: 指定额外的间距，以占受影响角色的前进宽度的百分比表示。

trans-unit.source: Specifies extra spacing in addition to the intrinsic inter-word spacing defined by the font.
trans-unit.target: 在字体定义的固有字间距之外,指定额外的字间距。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the replaced element's content object should be fitted to the containing element's box.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何将被替换元素的内容对象安装到包含元素的框中。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how this property affects grid layouts
trans-unit.target: 指定此属性如何影响网格布局。

trans-unit.source: Specifies no motion path at all.
trans-unit.target: 不指定任何运动路径。

trans-unit.source: Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the position of the origin. By default it is at the center of the element and can be moved. It is used by several transforms, like rotations, scaling or skewing, that need a specific point as a parameter.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the resource containing the font data. This can be a URL to a remote font file location or the name of a font on the user's computer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the symbols that are to be used for the marker representations. Symbols can contain string, images or custom identifiers. How the symbols are used to construct the marker representation is up to the algorithm specified in the system descriptor. For example, if the system specified is fixed, then each of the N symbols specified in the descriptor will be used to represent the first N counter symbols. Once the specified set of symbols have exhausted, the fallback style will be used for the rest of the list.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于标记表示的符号。符号可以包含字符串、图像或自定义标识符。如何使用这些符号来构建标记表示,由系统描述符中指定的算法决定。例如,如果指定的系统是固定的,那么描述符中指定的N个符号中的每一个都将被用来表示前N个计数器符号。一旦指定的符号集用完,其余的列表将使用后备样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the target size and orientation of the page box’s containing block. In the general case, where one page box is rendered onto one page sheet, it also indicates the size of the destination page sheet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the transforms to apply to the element. It is a space separated list of transforms, which are applied one after the other, as requested by the composition operation. Composite transforms are effectively applied in order from right to left.

trans-unit.source: Specifying cover for background-size makes the picture as small as possible while still covering the entire background area. contain, on the other hand, makes the image as large as possible while not being clipped by the background area.

trans-unit.source: Specifying a value other than visible (the default) creates a new block formatting context. This is necessary for technical reasons — if a float intersected with the scrolling element it would forcibly rewrap the content after each scroll step, leading to a slow scrolling experience.
trans-unit.target: 指定 visible 以外的其他值（默认值）会创建一个新的块格式化上下文。出于技术原因，这是必需的-如果浮标与滚动元素相交，它将在每个滚动步骤之后强行重新包装内容，从而导致缓慢的滚动体验。

trans-unit.source: Starting your exploration of grid with numbered lines is the most logical place to begin, as when you use grid layout you always have numbered lines. The lines are numbered for columns and rows, and are indexed from 1. Note that grid is indexed according to the writing mode of the document. In a left to right language such as English line 1 is on the left-hand side of the grid. If you are working in a right-to-left language then line 1 will be the far right of the grid. We will learn more about the interaction between writing modes and grids in a later guide.
trans-unit.target: 用编号行开始探索网格是最合理的开始,因为当你使用网格布局时,你总是有编号行。这些行是为列和行编号的,并从1开始索引。注意,网格是根据文档的书写模式来索引的。在从左到右的语言中,如英语,第1行在网格的左侧。如果你使用从右到左的语言,那么第1行将在网格的最右边。我们将在后面的指南中学习更多关于书写模式和网格之间的互动。

trans-unit.source: Sticky headers or footers, as styled above, stick to the top and bottom of the layout viewport, and therefore remain in view when we zoom in with the keyboard. If you pinch-zoom, the layout viewport may not be fully visible. If you magified from the middle of the layout viewport, the content expands in all four directions. If you had a sticky header or footer, they are still stuck to the top and bottom of the layout viewport, but they may not be visible at the top and bottom of the device's screen -- which is the visual viewport. The visual viewport is the currently visible portion of the layout viewport. If you scroll down, you are changing the contents of the visual viewport and bringing the bottom of the layout viewport into view, displaying the sticky footer, which will then stay stuck at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 如上所示，粘性页眉或页脚会粘贴到布局视口的顶部和底部，因此当我们使用键盘放大时，它们仍会保留在视图中。如果捏缩放，则布局视口可能不会完全可见。如果从布局视口的中间放大，内容将在所有四个方向上扩展。如果您具有粘性的页眉或页脚，它们仍将停留在布局视口的顶部和底部，但是在设备屏幕的顶部和底部（可视视口）可能看不到。可视视口是布局视口的当前可见部分。如果向下滚动，则将更改可视视口的内容，并使布局视口的底部可见，显示粘性页脚，然后将其停留在底部。

trans-unit.source: Styles defined by the :active pseudo-class will be overridden by any subsequent link-related pseudo-class (:link, :hover, or :visited) that has at least equal specificity. To style links appropriately, put the :active rule after all other link-related rules, as defined by the LVHA-order: :link — :visited — :hover — :active.
trans-unit.target: :active 伪类定义的样式将被具有至少相同特异性的任何后续链接相关伪类（ :link ， :hover 或 :visited ）覆盖。要链接样式适当，就把 :active 规则的所有其他链接相关的规则后，由定义LVHA阶： :link - :visited - :hover - :active 。

trans-unit.source: Styles defined by the :active pseudo-class will be overridden by any subsequent link-related pseudo-class (:link, :visited, or :active) that has at least equal specificity. trans-unit.source: Such blocks are naturally called declaration blocks and declarations inside them are separated by a semi-colon, ';' (U+003B SEMICOLON). A declaration block may be empty, that is containing null declaration. White spaces around declarations are ignored. The last declaration of a block doesn't need to be terminated by a semi-colon, though it is often considered good style to do it as it prevents forgetting to add it when extending the block with another declaration.
trans-unit.target: 这样的块自然称为声明块，其内部的声明用分号' ; 分隔。（ U+003B SEMICOLON ）。声明块可能为空，其中包含空声明。声明周围的空白将被忽略。块的最后一个声明不需要用分号终止，尽管通常认为这样做很不错，因为这样做可以避免在用另一个声明扩展该块时忘记添加它。

trans-unit.source: Text decorations are drawn across descendant text elements. This means that if an element specifies a text decoration, then a child element can't remove the decoration. For example, in the markup <p>This text has <em>some emphasized words</em> in it.</p>, the style rule p { text-decoration: underline; } would cause the entire paragraph to be underlined. The style rule em { text-decoration: none; } would not cause any change; the entire paragraph would still be underlined. However, the rule em { text-decoration: overline; } would cause a second decoration to appear on "some emphasized words".
trans-unit.target: 文本装饰跨越子代文本元素绘制。这意味着，如果一个元素指定了文本修饰，则子元素无法删除该修饰。例如，在标记 <p>This text has <em>some emphasized words</em> in it.</p> ，样式规则 p { text-decoration: underline; } 会使整个段落带有下划线。样式规则 em { text-decoration: none; } 不会引起任何改变；整个段落仍会强调。但是，规则 em { text-decoration: overline; } 将导致第二修饰出现在“一些强调的单词”上。

trans-unit.source: That’s all I need. I don’t need to do any calculations, grid automatically removed my 10 pixel gutter track before assigning the space to the 1fr column tracks. As you start to build out your own layouts, you will find that the syntax becomes more familiar and you choose the ways that work best for you and the type of projects you like to build. Try building some common patterns with these various methods, and you will soon find your most productive way to work. Then, in the next guide we will look at how grid can position items for us - without us needing to use placement properties at all!
trans-unit.target: 这就是我所需要的。我不需要进行任何计算，在将空间分配给 1fr 列轨道之前，grid会自动删除我的10像素装订线轨道。在开始构建自己的布局时，您会发现语法变得更加熟悉，并且选择了最适合自己的方式以及要构建的项目类型。尝试使用这些各种方法构建一些通用模式，您很快就会找到最有效的工作方式。然后，在下一个指南中，我们将了解网格如何为我们定位项目-根本不需要使用放置属性！

trans-unit.source: The "client" coordinate system uses as its origin the top-left corner of the viewport or browsing context in which the event occurred. This is the entire viewing area in which the document is presented. Scrolling is not a factor.
trans-unit.target: "客户端 "坐标系以事件发生的视口或浏览上下文的左上角为原点。这就是文档呈现的整个浏览区域。滚动不是一个因素。

trans-unit.source: The "hard" hyphen character indicates a visible line break opportunity. Even if the line is not actually broken at that point, the hyphen is still rendered.
trans-unit.target: 硬 "连字符表示一个可见的断行机会。即使此时行没有实际断行,连字符也会被呈现。

trans-unit.source: The "page" coordinate system gives the position of a pixel relative to the top-left corner of the entire Document in which the pixel is located. That means that a given point in an element within the document will keep the same coordinates in the page model unless the element moves (either directly by changing its position or indirectly by adding or resizing other content).
trans-unit.target: “页面”坐标系给出了像素相对于像素所在的整个 Document 左上角的位置。这意味着文档中元素的给定点将在页面模型中保持相同的坐标，除非元素移动（直接通过更改其位置或通过添加或调整其他内容的大小间接移动）。

trans-unit.source: The <basic-shape> type
trans-unit.target: <basic-shape>类型

trans-unit.source: The 20% opacity threshold for treating gradient pixels as part of the shape is then established using shape-image-threadhold with a value of 0.2.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用 shape-image-threadhold 设置值为 0.2 的20％不透明度阈值，将阈值像素视为形状的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The align-content property aligns a flex container's lines within the flex container when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how justify-content aligns individual items within the main axis. Note that this property has no effect when the flexbox has only a single line.
trans-unit.target: 当横轴上有多余的空间时， align-content 属性将flex容器内的行对齐在flex容器内，类似于 justify-content 在主轴内对齐单个项目的方式。请注意，当flexbox只有一行时，此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: The align-content property applies to the block axis and justify-content to the inline axis. Any spacing added to the columns due to use of space distribution will be added to the gap between the columns, therefore making the gap larger than might be specified by the column-gap property.
trans-unit.target: 在 align-content 属性适用于阻光轴和 justify-content 于一字形轴。由于使用了空间分布而增加到列的任何间距都将添加到列之间的间隙中，因此使该间隙大于 column-gap 属性指定的间隙。

trans-unit.source: The align-content property applies to the block axis in order to align the contents of the box within its container. If a content distribution method such as space-between, space-around or space-evenly is requested then the fallback alignment will be used, as the content is treated as a single alignment subject.
trans-unit.target: 在 align-content 属性适用于阻光轴以它的容器内对准框的内容。如果内容分发方法，例如 space-between ， space-around 或 space-evenly 被请求，则回退对准将被使用，作为内容作为单一治疗对准受试者。

trans-unit.source: The align-items property sets the align-self property for all of the child grid items. This means that you can set the property individually, by using align-self on a grid item.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-items 属性设置 align-self 为所有子网格项目的属性。这意味着您可以通过在网格项目上使用 align-self 来分别设置属性。

trans-unit.source: The align-items property will align the items on the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-items 属性将对齐的十字轴的项目。

trans-unit.source: The align-self and align-items properties control alignment on the block axis. When we use these properties, we are changing the alignment of the item within the grid area you have placed it.
trans-unit.target: 在 align-self 和 align-items 属性控制所述块轴线对准。使用这些属性时，我们正在更改项目在您放置的网格区域内的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: The align-self property does not apply to block-level boxes (including floats), because there is more than one item in the block axis. It also does not apply to table cells.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-self 属性不适用于块级盒（包括花车），因为在该块轴的多个项目。它也不适用于表格单元格。

trans-unit.source: The animation shorthand is useful for saving space. As an example, the rule we’ve been using through this article:
trans-unit.target: 该 animation 简写为节省空间非常有用。例如，我们在本文中一直使用的规则：

trans-unit.source: The background-size CSS property makes it possible to adjust the width and height of background images, thus overriding the default behavior which tiles background images at their full size. You can scale the image upward or downward as desired.
trans-unit.target: 该 background-size CSS属性使得它可以调整背景图像的宽度和高度，从而覆盖在它们的全尺寸瓷砖背景图片的默认行为。您可以根据需要向上或向下缩放图像。

trans-unit.source: The break-before and break-after properties are used to control breaks before and after elements. They take the following values when in a multicol context:
trans-unit.target: 在 break-before 和 break-after 之前和之后的元件特性被用来控制中断。在multicol上下文中，它们采用以下值：

trans-unit.source: The column-gap property was specified in earlier versions of the multiple-column layout specification, and has now been unified with the gap properties for other layout methods in box alignment. While other layout methods treat the initial value of column-gap as 0 multicol treats it as 1em, as in general you would not want to have no gap between columns.
trans-unit.target: 该 column-gap 财产是在早期版本的多列布局规范的规定，现在已经被统一为在盒子对准其他布局方法的差距属性。虽然其他布局方法将column-gap的初始值视为0，但multicol会将其视为1em，因为通常您不希望列之间没有间隙。

trans-unit.source: The CSS Animations specification doesn't offer a way to run an animation again. There's no magic resetAnimation() method on elements, and you can't even just set the element's animation-play-state to "running" again. Instead, you have to use clever tricks to get a stopped animation to replay.
trans-unit.target: 该CSS动画规范没有提供一种方式来再次运行动画。元素上没有神奇的 resetAnimation() 方法，您甚至不能仅将元素的 animation-play-state 再次设置为 "running" 。相反，您必须使用巧妙的技巧来使已停止的动画重播。

trans-unit.source: The Box Alignment Specification details how alignment works in various layout methods. In this page we explore how box alignment works in the context of block layout, including floated, positioned, and table elements. As this page aims to detail things which are specific to block layout and box alignment, it should be read in conjunction with the main Box Alignment page, which details the common features of box alignment across layout methods.
trans-unit.target: 该框对齐规格细节比对各种布局方法是如何工作的。在此页面中，我们探索框对齐在块布局（包括浮动元素，定位元素和表格元素）的上下文中如何工作。由于此页面旨在详细说明特定于块布局和框对齐的内容，因此应与“ 框对齐”主页面一起阅读，该页面详细介绍了跨布局方法的框对齐的常见功能。

trans-unit.source: The Box Alignment Specification details how alignment works in various layout methods; on this page we explore how Box Alignment works in the context of Multi-column Layout. As this page aims to detail things which are specific to Multi-column Layout and Box Alignment, it should be read in conjunction with the main Box Alignment page which details the common features of Box Alignment across layout methods.
trans-unit.target: 该框对齐的详细规格排列在不同的布局方法是如何工作的;在此页面上，我们探讨了“框对齐”在多列布局的背景下如何工作。由于此页面旨在详细说明多列布局和框对齐特定的内容，因此应与“ 框对齐”主页面一起阅读，该页面详细介绍了跨布局方法的框对齐的常见功能。

trans-unit.source: The Box Alignment Specification details how alignment works in various layout methods; on this page we explore how box alignment works in the context of Flexbox. As this page aims to detail things which are specific to Flexbox and box alignment, it should be read in conjunction with the main Box Alignment page which details the common features of box alignment across layout methods.
trans-unit.target: 该框对齐的详细规格排列在不同的布局方法是如何工作的; 在此页面上，我们探索在Flexbox上下文中框对齐的工作方式。由于此页面旨在详细介绍Flexbox和Box对齐特有的内容，因此应与Box Alignment主页面一起阅读，该页面详细介绍了跨布局方法进行Box对齐的常见功能。

trans-unit.target: 该框对齐的详细规格排列在不同的布局方法是如何工作的。在此页面上，我们探索在CSS Grid Layout的上下文中框对齐的工作方式。

trans-unit.source: The CSS Logical Properties and Values specification includes logical versions of the properties that control margins, padding and borders as well as other mappings for things that we have typically used physical directions to specify.
trans-unit.target: 该CSS逻辑属性和值规范包括控制利润率，填充和边框以及其它映射的事情，我们通常使用的物理方向指定属性的逻辑版本。

trans-unit.source: The flex property specifies the components of a flexible length; flex-grow factor, flex-shrink factor, and the flex-basis. When an element is a flex item, flex is consulted instead of the main size property to determine the main size of the element. If an element is not a flex item, flex has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex 属性指定的柔性长度的组件; flex-grow factor， flex-shrink factor和 flex-basis 。当元素是flex项目时，将使用 flex 而不是main size属性来确定元素的主要大小。如果元素不是弹性项目，则 flex 无效。

trans-unit.source: The flex-basis property is set to auto.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-basis 属性设置为 auto 。

trans-unit.source: The flex-basis property sets the flex basis. Negative lengths are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-basis 属性设置柔性基础。负长度无效。

trans-unit.source: The flex-basis property specifies the initial size of the flex item before any space distribution happens. The initial value for this property is auto. If flex-basis is set to auto then to work out the initial size of the item the browser first checks if the main size of the item has an absolute size set. This would be the case if you had given your item a width of 200 pixels. In that case 200px would be the flex-basis for this item.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-basis 属性指定的任何空间分布发生之前柔性项目的初始大小。此属性的初始值为 auto 。如果 flex-basis 设置为 auto ，则要计算出商品的初始尺寸，浏览器会首先检查商品的主尺寸是否设置了绝对尺寸。如果您为商品指定了200像素的宽度，情况就是这样。在这种情况下， 200px 将是该项目的 flex-basis 。

trans-unit.source: The flex-direction property can take one of four values:
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-direction 财产可以采取四个值之一：

trans-unit.source: The flex-direction property specifies how flex items are placed in the flex container, by setting the direction of the flex container's main axis. This determines the direction in which flex items are laid out in.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-direction 属性指定如何柔性物品被放置在所述柔性容器，通过设置在柔性容器的主轴线的方向。这确定了弹性项目的布置方向。

trans-unit.source: The flex-flow property is shorthand for setting the flex-direction and flex-wrap properties, which together define the flex container's main and cross axes.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-flow 属性是用于设定速记 flex-direction 和 flex-wrap 的特性，它们一起限定所述柔性容器的主要和交叉轴。

trans-unit.source: The flex-grow property sets the flex grow factor. Negative numbers are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-grow 属性设置柔性成长的因素。负数无效。

trans-unit.source: The flex-grow property specifies the flex grow factor, which determines how much the flex item will grow relative to the rest of the flex items in the flex container when the positive free space is distributed.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-grow 属性指定弯曲增长的因素，这决定了有多少当正的自由空间分布的柔性项目将相对增长到柔性容器的柔性物品的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: The flex-shrink property sets the flex shrink factor. Negative numbers are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-shrink 属性设置弹性收缩的因素。负数无效。

trans-unit.source: The flex-shrink property specifies the flex shrink factor, which determines how much the flex item will shrink relative to the rest of the flex items in the flex container when negative free space is distributed.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-shrink 属性指定弯曲收缩因素，这决定了有多少时负的自由空间分布的柔性项目将收缩相对于柔性容器的柔性物品的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: The flex-wrap property controls whether the flex container is single-lined or multi-lined and the direction of the cross-axis, which determines the direction in which the new lines are stacked in.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-wrap 属性控制所述柔性容器是单衬里或多行和横轴，其确定新的线条重叠的方向的方向。

trans-unit.source: The flex-wrap property is set to nowrap.
trans-unit.target: 在 flex-wrap 属性设置为 nowrap 。

trans-unit.source: The float no longer applies, and I can use the CSS Box Alignment property align-self to align my content to the end of the container:
trans-unit.target: 该 float 不再适用了，我可以使用CSS框对齐属性 align-self 到我的内容对齐到容器的末尾：

trans-unit.source: The grid shorthand goes a step further and also sets properties used by the implicit grid. So you will be setting:
trans-unit.target: 所述 grid 速记更进了一步，也设置由隐式网格使用的属性。因此，您将设置：

trans-unit.source: The grid-template property sets the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-template 属性设置以下属性：

trans-unit.source: The justify-content property aligns flex items along the main axis of the current line of the flex container. This is done after any flexible lengths and any auto margins have been resolved. Typically, it helps to distribute extra free space leftover when either all the flex items on a line are inflexible, or are flexible but have reached their maximum size. It also exerts some control over the alignment of items when they overflow the line.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-content 属性对齐沿着曲容器的当前行的主轴弯曲的物品。在解决了任何灵活的长度和任何自动边距之后，便可以执行此操作。通常，当行中的所有伸缩项目都不灵活或已达到最大大小时，它有助于分配剩余的剩余可用空间。当项目溢出线时，它还对项目的对齐方式施加一些控制。

trans-unit.source: The justify-content property does not apply to block containers or table cells.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-content 属性不适用于块容器或表格单元格。

trans-unit.source: The justify-content property is used to align the items on the main axis, the direction in which flex-direction has set the flow. The initial value is flex-start which will line the items up at the start edge of the container, but you could also set the value to flex-end to line them up at the end, or center to line them up in the centre.
trans-unit.target: 的 justify-content 属性被用于对准在主轴线的物品，其中，所述方向 flex-direction 已设定的流量。初始值为 flex-start ，它将在容器的开始边缘对齐项目，但您也可以将值设置为 flex-end 以在末尾对齐它们，或将其 center 以在中心对齐。

trans-unit.source: The justify-self and justify-items properties are not implemented in flexbox. This is due to the one-dimensional nature of flexbox, and that there may be multiple items along the axis, making it impossible to justify a single item. To align items along the main, inline axis in flexbox you use the justify-content property.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-self 和 justify-items 属性不会在Flexbox的实现。这是由于flexbox的一维特性所致，并且沿轴可能有多个项目，因此无法证明单个项目的合理性。要沿Flexbox的主内联轴对齐项目，请使用 justify-content 属性。

trans-unit.source: The justify-self property is used to align an item inside its containing block on the inline axis.
trans-unit.target: 的 justify-self 属性用于对准在字形轴其包含块内的项目。

trans-unit.source: The linear-gradient() and radial-gradient() properties don't support automatically repeated color stops. However, the repeating-linear-gradient() and repeating-radial-gradient() properties are available to offer this functionality.
trans-unit.target: 的 linear-gradient() 和 radial-gradient() 属性不支持自动地重复颜色停止。但是， repeating-linear-gradient() 和 repeating-radial-gradient() 属性可用于提供此功能。

trans-unit.source: The top and bottom margins of blocks are sometimes combined (collapsed) into a single margin whose size is the largest of the individual margins (or just one of them, if they are equal), a behavior known as margin collapsing. Note that the margins of floating and absolutely positioned elements never collapse.
trans-unit.target: 块的顶部和底部边距有时被合并（折叠）为单个边距，其大小是各个边距中的最大值（如果相等，则为其中之一），这种行为称为边距折叠。请注意，浮动元素和绝对定位元素的边距永远不会崩溃。

trans-unit.source: The order property controls the order in which flex items appear within their flex container, by assigning them to ordinal groups.
trans-unit.target: 该 order 属性控制在弯曲的物品出现在他们的柔性容器中，通过将它们分配到有序组的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The orphans and widows properties are also useful. The orphans property controls the number of lines left on their own at the end of a fragment. The widows property controls the number left on their own at the start of a fragment.
trans-unit.target: 将 orphans 和 widows 性能也非常有用。orphans属性控制片段末尾自行保留的行数。widows属性控制片段开始时自己留下的数字。

trans-unit.source: The resize property sets whether or not an item can be resized and has physical values of horizontal and vertical. The resize property also has logical keyword values. Using resize: inline allows resizing in the inline dimension and resize: block allow resizing in the block dimension.
trans-unit.target: 的 resize 属性设置是否一个项目可以被调整大小，并且具有物理值 horizontal 和 vertical 。该 resize 属性也有逻辑关键字值。使用 resize: inline 允许调整内联维度的 resize: block ，resize：block允许调整区块维度的大小。

trans-unit.source: The shape-image-threshold property enables the creation of shapes from areas which are not fully transparent. If the value of shape-image-threshold is 0.0 (which is the initial value) then the area must be fully transparent. If the value is 1.0 then it is fully opaque. Values in between mean that you can set a semi-transparent area as the defining area.
trans-unit.target: 的 shape-image-threshold 属性使形状的来自不是完全透明区域的产生。如果 shape-image-threshold 的值为 0.0 （这是初始值），则该区域必须完全透明。如果值为 1.0 ,则它是完全不透明的。之间的值意味着您可以将半透明区域设置为定义区域。

trans-unit.source: The shape-margin property adds a margin to shape-outside. This will further shorten the line boxes of any content wrapping the shape, pushing it away from the shape itself.
trans-unit.target: 该 shape-margin 属性来添加余量 shape-outside 。这将进一步缩短包裹该形状的任何内容的线框，将其推离该形状本身。

trans-unit.source: The text-align property has logical values that relate to text direction — rather than using left and right we can use start and end. In the below example I have set text-align: right in the first block and text-align: end in the second.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-align 属性具有涉及到的文字方向逻辑值-而不是使用 left 和 right ，我们可以使用 start 和 end 。在下面的例子中我有组 text-align: right 在第一块和 text-align: end 中的第二个。

trans-unit.source: The writing-mode property accepts the values horizontal-tb, vertical-rl and vertical-lr. These values control the direction that blocks flow on the page. The initial value is horizontal-tb, which is a top to bottom block flow direction with a horizontal inline direction. Left to right languages, such as English, and Right to left languages. such as Arabic, are all horizontal-tb.
trans-unit.target: 在 writing-mode 属性接受的值 horizontal-tb ， vertical-rl 和 vertical-lr 。这些值控制阻止页面上的流的方向。初始值为 horizontal-tb, 它是从上到下的块流动方向，水平为行内方向。从左到右的语言（例如英语）和从右到左的语言。例如阿拉伯语，都是 horizontal-tb 。

trans-unit.source: The ::marker is outside the principal block box.
trans-unit.target: 的 ::marker 是原始块框之外。

trans-unit.source: The ::marker is the first element among the list item's contents.
trans-unit.target: 该 ::marker 为列表项的内容中的第一要素。

trans-unit.source: The ::placeholder pseudo-element styles the placeholder itself.
trans-unit.target: 该 ::placeholder 伪元素风格的占位符本身。

trans-unit.source: The :placeholder-shown pseudo-class styles an element that has an active placeholder.
trans-unit.target: 的 :placeholder-shown 伪类样式的元件具有的活性占位符。

trans-unit.target: 的 :root 伪类

trans-unit.source: The @font-feature-values at-rule can define names for alternative glyph functions (stylistic, styleset, character-variant, swash, ornament or annotation), associating the name with OpenType parameters. This property allows those human-readable names (defined in @font-feature-values) in the stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 在 @font-feature-values 在规则可以定义替代字形函数（名称 stylistic ， styleset ， character-variant ， swash ， ornament 或 annotation ），该名称与参数的OpenType关联。此属性允许样式表中那些易于理解的名称（在 @font-feature-values 定义）。

trans-unit.target: 该 zoom 视描述符，与使用 @viewport

trans-unit.target: 该 align-content 属性

trans-unit.source: The all property lets you reset all properties to their initial, inherited, reverted, or unset state at once.
trans-unit.target: 将 all 财产，你可以一次全部属性重置为初始，继承，恢复，或取消状态。

trans-unit.source: The all property resets all CSS declarations to a given known state
trans-unit.target: 将 all 财产重置所有CSS声明给定的已知状态

trans-unit.source: The <angle> of rotation to apply to the image. It is rounded to the nearest 90deg (0.25turn).
trans-unit.target: 所述 <angle> 旋转应用到图像。将其舍入到最接近的 90deg （ 0.25turn ）。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-repeat, border-image-width, and border-image-outset properties determine how these regions are used to form the final border image.
trans-unit.target: 所述 border-image-repeat ， border-image-width ，和 border-image-outset 属性确定如何将这些区域用于形成最终的图像边界。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-slice property is used to divide the source image into regions, which are then dynamically applied to the final border image.
trans-unit.target: 所述 border-image-slice 属性用于将源图像分割成区域，然后将其动态地应用于最终边界图像。

trans-unit.source: The box model, box-sizing
trans-unit.target: 该盒模型， box-sizing

trans-unit.source: The positioning scheme: in the normal flow, a float, or absolute positioning.
trans-unit.target: 的定位方案：在正常流动，浮子，或绝对定位。

trans-unit.source: The clip-path property creates a clipping region that defines what part of an entire element should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 clip-path 属性创建剪辑区域，它定义了一个的一部分整个元件应该被显示。

trans-unit.source: The ISO/IEC CD 14496-22 3rd edition suggests using the ssty feature to provide glyph variants more suitable for use in scripts (for example primes used as superscripts). Starting with Firefox 29, this is done automatically by the MathML rendering engine. The ISO/IEC CD 14496-22 3rd edition also suggests applying the dtls feature to letters when placing mathematical accents to get dotless forms (for example dotless i, j with a hat). Starting with Firefox 35, this is done automatically by the MathML rendering engine. You can override the default values determined by the MathML rendering engine with CSS.
trans-unit.target: 在ISO / IEC CD 14496-22第三版建议使用 ssty 特征是提供字形变体更适用于在脚本中使用（用作标例如素数）。从Firefox 29开始，此操作由MathML呈现引擎自动完成。ISO / IEC CD 14496-22第3版还建议在放置数学重音以获取无点形式（例如，带帽子的无点i，j）时，对字母应用 dtls 功能。从Firefox 35开始，此操作由MathML呈现引擎自动完成。您可以使用CSS覆盖MathML渲染引擎确定的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The user agent will scale an image when the page author specifies dimensions other than its natural size. Scaling may also occur due to user interaction (zooming). For example, if the natural size of an image is100×100px, but its actual dimensions are 200×200px (or 50×50px), then the image will be upscaled (or downscaled) using the algorithm specified by image-rendering. This property has no effect on non-scaled images.
trans-unit.target: 该用户代理在页面作者指定比其自然大小其它尺寸将缩放图像。由于用户交互（缩放），缩放也可能发生。例如，如果图像的自然尺寸为 100×100px ，但其实际尺寸为 200×200px （或 50×50px ），则将使用 image-rendering 指定的算法对图像进行放大（或缩小）。此属性对非缩放图像不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The CSSalign-items property sets the align-self value on all direct children as a group. The align-self property sets the alignment of an item within its containing block. trans-unit.source: The CSS Logical Properties specification aims to change that, and in future we will be able to use the logical equivalents for properties, such as margin-left and margin-right, in our CSS. Firefox has already implemented these, so you can try them out right now in Firefox. I know in the future, once these ship everywhere, your knowledge of "Block and inline" through using Grid, will mean you know exactly how to use these too.
trans-unit.target: 该CSS属性的逻辑规范旨在改变这种状况，在未来，我们将能够使用逻辑等效的属性，如 margin-left 和 margin-right ，在我们的CSS。 Firefox已经实现了这些功能，因此您可以立即在Firefox中试用它们。我知道，将来，一旦这些技术无处不在，您通过使用Grid所获得的“块和内联”知识将意味着您也确切地知道如何使用它们。

trans-unit.source: The VoiceOver screen reader has an issue where unordered lists with a list-style-type value of none applied to them will not be announced as a list. To address this, add a zero-width space as pseudo content before each list item to ensure the list is announced properly. This ensures the design is unaffected by the bug fix and that list items are not improperly described.
trans-unit.target: 该的VoiceOver屏幕阅读器具有这样一个无序列表的问题 list-style-type 的值 none 适用于他们不会被宣布为一个列表。要解决此问题，请在每个列表项之前添加一个零宽度的空格作为伪内容，以确保正确声明该列表。这样可以确保设计不受错误修复的影响，并且不会对列表项进行不正确的描述。
