trans-unit.target: 所述 <blend-mode> CSS 数据类型描述了当元素重叠颜色应该如何显示。它在 background-blend-mode 和 mix-blend-mode 属性中使用。

trans-unit.source: The <color> data type is specified using one of the options listed below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <color> 数据类型是使用下面列出的选项之一所指定。

trans-unit.source: The <color>CSSdata type represents a color in the sRGB color space. A <color> may also include an alpha-channeltransparency value, indicating how the color should composite with its background.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <color> CSS 数据类型表示在一个颜色sRGB色彩空间。甲 <color> 还可以包括alpha通道透明度值，指示如何颜色应该复合其背景。

trans-unit.source: The <custom-ident> cannot take the span value.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <custom-ident> 不能采取 span 值。

trans-unit.source: The <custom-ident>CSSdata type denotes an arbitrary user-defined string used as an identifier. It is case-sensitive, and certain values are forbidden in various contexts to prevent ambiguity.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <custom-ident> CSS 数据类型表示用作一个任意的用户定义的字符串的标识符。它区分大小写，在各种情况下都禁止使用某些值以防止歧义。

trans-unit.source: The <display-inside> value is defined using a keyword from the list below:
trans-unit.target: 所述 <display-inside> 值使用从下面列表中的关键字定义如下：

trans-unit.source: The <display-outside> keywords specify the element’s outer display type, which is essentially its role in flow layout. These keywords are used as values of the display property, and can be used for legacy purposes as a single keyword, or as defined in the Level 3 specification alongside a value from the <display-inside> keywords.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <display-outside> 关键字指定该元素的外 display 类型，这基本上是其流布局的作用。这些关键字用作 display 属性的值，并且可以作为单个关键字用于旧版目的，或者如在Level 3规范中定义的，与 <display-inside> 关键字中的值一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The <display-outside> value is defined using a keyword from the list below:
trans-unit.target: 所述 <display-outside> 值使用从下面列表中的关键字定义如下：

trans-unit.source: The <filter-function> data type is specified using one of the filter functions listed below. Each function requires an argument which, if invalid, results in no filter being applied.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <filter-function> 数据类型是使用下面列出的过滤器功能的一个指定。每个函数都需要一个参数，如果无效，该参数将导致不应用任何过滤器。

trans-unit.source: The <flex> data type is specified as a <number> followed by the unit fr. The fr unit represents a fraction of the leftover space in the grid container. As with all CSS dimensions, there is no space between the unit and the number.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <flex> 数据类型被指定为一个 <number> 接着部 fr 。的 fr 单元表示在网格容器剩空间的一小部分。与所有CSS尺寸一样，单位和数字之间没有空格。

trans-unit.source: The <flex>CSSdata type denotes a flexible length within a grid container. It is used in grid-template-columns, grid-template-rows and other related properties.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <flex> CSS 数据类型表示网格容器内的柔性长度。它用于 grid-template-columns ， grid-template-rows 和其他相关属性。

trans-unit.source: The <frequency> data type consists of a <number> followed by one of the units listed below. As with all CSS dimensions, there is no space between the unit literal and the number.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <frequency> 数据类型由一个的 <number> 接着下面列出的单元中的一个。与所有CSS尺寸一样，单位文字和数字之间没有空格。

trans-unit.source: The <frequency>CSSdata type represents a frequency dimension, such as the pitch of a speaking voice. It is not currently used in any CSS properties.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <frequency> CSS 数据类型表示频率维度，诸如说话声音的音高。当前没有在任何CSS属性中使用它。

trans-unit.source: The <gradient> data type is defined with one of the function types listed below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <gradient> 数据类型与下面列出的功能类型之一定义。

trans-unit.source: The <gradient>CSSdata type is a special type of <image> that consists of a progressive transition between two or more colors.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <gradient> CSS 数据类型是一种特殊类型的 <image> ，它由两种或多种颜色之间的渐进转换的。

trans-unit.source: The <image> data type can be represented with any of the following:
trans-unit.target: 所述 <image> 数据类型可以与任何以下来表示：

trans-unit.source: The <image>CSSdata type represents a two-dimensional image. There are two kinds of images: plain images, referenced with a <url>, and dynamically-generated images, generated with <gradient> or element(). Images can be used with numerous CSS properties, such as background-image, border-image, content, cursor, and list-style-image.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <image> CSS 数据类型代表一个二维图像。有两种图像：用 <url> 引用的普通图像和用 <gradient> 或 element() 生成的动态生成的图像。图像可以与许多CSS属性一起使用，例如 background-image ， border-image ， content ， cursor 和 list-style-image 。

trans-unit.source: The <integer> data type consists of one or several decimal digits, 0 through 9 inclusive, optionally preceded by a single + or - sign. There is no unit associated with integers.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <integer> 数据类型由一个或若干个十进制数字，0到9以下，任选由一个前面 + 或 - 符号。没有与整数关联的单位。

trans-unit.source: The <integer> specifies a minimum length that all counter representations must reach. The value must be non-negative. If the minimum length is not reached, the representation will be padded with the specified <symbol>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <integer> 指定的最小长度的所有计数器的表示必须达到。该值必须为非负数。如果未达到最小长度，则将使用指定的 <symbol> 填充表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The <integer>CSSdata type is a special type of <number> that represents a whole number, whether positive or negative. Integers can be used in numerous CSS properties, such as column-count, counter-increment, grid-column, grid-row, and z-index.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <integer> CSS 数据类型是一种特殊类型的 <number> 表示一个整数，无论是正或负。整数可用于多种CSS属性，例如 column-count ， counter-increment ， grid-column ， grid-row 和 z-index 。

trans-unit.source: The <length> data type consists of a <number> followed by one of the units listed below. As with all CSS dimensions, there is no space between the unit literal and the number. The length unit is optional after the number 0.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <length> 数据类型由一个的 <number> 接着下面列出的单元中的一个。与所有CSS尺寸一样，单位文字和数字之间没有空格。长度单位在数字 0 之后是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The <length>CSSdata type represents a distance value. Lengths can be used in numerous CSS properties, such as width, height, margin, padding, border-width, font-size, and text-shadow.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <length> CSS 数据类型表示的距离值。可以在许多CSS属性中使用长度，例如 width ， height ， margin ， padding ， border-width ， font-size 和 text-shadow 。

trans-unit.source: The <number>CSSdata type represents a number, being either an integer or a number with a fractional component.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <number> CSS 数据类型代表一个数字，是一个整数或小数部分的数。

trans-unit.source: The <percentage> data type consists of a <number> followed by the percentage sign (%). Optionally, it may be preceded by a single + or - sign, although negative values are not valid for all properties. As with all CSS dimensions, there is no space between the symbol and the number.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <percentage> 数据类型由一个的 <number> 接着百分号（ % ）。可选地，它前面可以带有一个 + 或 - 号，尽管负值并非对所有属性都有效。与所有CSS尺寸一样，符号和数字之间没有空格。

trans-unit.source: The <percentage>CSSdata type represents a percentage value. It is often used to define a size as relative to an element's parent object. Numerous properties can use percentages, such as width, height, margin, padding, and font-size.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <percentage> CSS 数据类型表示一个百分比值。它通常用于定义相对于元素父对象的大小。许多属性可以使用百分比，例如 width ， height ， margin ， padding 和 font-size 。

trans-unit.source: The <position> data type is specified with one or two keywords, with optional offsets.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <position> 数据类型与一个或两个关键字为单位指定，可选的偏移。

trans-unit.source: The <position>CSSdata type denotes a two-dimensional coordinate used to set a location relative to an element box. It is used in the background-position property.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <position> CSS 数据类型表示的二维坐标，用于在相对于元件盒的位置设置。它在 background-position 属性中使用。

trans-unit.source: The <ratio> data type consists of a strictly positive <integer> followed by a forward slash ('/', Unicode U+002F SOLIDUS) and a second strictly positive <integer>. Spaces before and after the slash are optional. The first number represents the width, while the second represents the height.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <ratio> 数据类型包括严格的正 <integer> 后跟一个正斜线（“/”，Unicode的 U+002F SOLIDUS ）和第二严格正 <integer> 。斜杠前后的空格是可选的。第一个数字表示宽度，第二个数字表示高度。

trans-unit.source: The <ratio>CSSdata type, used for describing aspect ratios in media queries, denotes the proportion between two unitless values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <ratio> CSS 数据类型，用于描述高宽比在媒体查询，表示两个无量纲值之间的比例。

trans-unit.source: The <resolution> data type consists of a strictly positive <number> followed by one of the units listed below. As with all CSS dimensions, there is no space between the unit literal and the number.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <resolution> 数据类型由一个严格的正的 <number> 接着下面列出的单元中的一个。与所有CSS尺寸一样，单位文字和数字之间没有空格。

trans-unit.source: The <resolution>CSSdata type, used for describing resolutions in media queries, denotes the pixel density of an output device, i.e., its resolution.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <resolution> CSS 数据类型，用于描述分辨率在媒体查询，表示输出装置的像素密度，即，它的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The <shape> data type is specified using the rect() function, which produces a region in the form of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <shape> 数据类型使用指定的 rect() 函数，该函数在一个矩形的形式产生的区域。

trans-unit.source: The <shape>CSSdata type defines the specific form (shape) of a region. The region represents the part of an element to which the clip property applies.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <shape> CSS 数据类型定义了一个区域的具体形式（形状）。该区域表示 clip 属性应用于的元素部分。

trans-unit.source: The <shape-radius> argument represents r, the radius of the circle. Negative values are invalid. A percentage value here is resolved from the used width and height of the reference box as sqrt(width^2+height^2)/sqrt(2).
trans-unit.target: 所述 <shape-radius> 参数代表- [R ，该圆的半径。负值无效。此处的百分比值从参考框的已使用宽度和高度解析为 sqrt(width^2+height^2)/sqrt(2) 。

trans-unit.source: The <shape-radius> arguments represent rx and ry, the x-axis and y-axis radii of the ellipse, in that order. Negative values for either radius are invalid. Percentage values here are resolved against the used width (for the rx value) and the used height (for the ry value) of the reference box.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <shape-radius> 参数表示R X和r ÿ，椭圆的x轴和y轴的半径，在该顺序。任一半径的负值均无效。此处的百分比值针对参考框的已使用宽度（用于r x值）和已使用高度（用于r y值）进行解析。

trans-unit.source: The <single-transition-timing-function>CSSdata type denotes a mathematical function that describes how fast one-dimensional values change during animations. This lets you vary the animation's speed over the course of its duration.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <single-transition-timing-function> CSS 数据类型表示描述动画期间一维的值如何快速改变的数学函数。这使您可以在动画持续时间内改变动画的速度。

trans-unit.source: The <string> data type is composed of any number of Unicode characters surrounded by either double (") or single (') quotes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <string> 数据类型是由任意数量的的Unicode字符包围或者双（ " ）或单（ ' ）引号。

trans-unit.source: The <string>CSSdata type represents a sequence of characters. Strings are used in numerous CSS properties, such as content, font-family, and quotes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <string> CSS 数据类型表示的字符序列。字符串用于众多CSS属性中，例如 content ， font-family 和 quotes 。

trans-unit.source: The <time> data type consists of a​ ​​​​​​<number> followed by one of the units listed below. Optionally, it may be preceded by a single + or - sign. As with all dimensions, there is no space between the unit literal and the number.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <time> 数据类型由一个的 <number> 接着下面列出的单元中的一个。（可选）可以在其前面加一个 + 或 - 号。与所有维一样，单位文字和数字之间没有空格。

trans-unit.source: The <time>CSSdata type represents a time value expressed in seconds or milliseconds. It is used in animation, transition, and related properties.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <time> CSS 数据类型代表以秒或毫秒表示的时间值。它用于 animation ， transition 和相关属性。

trans-unit.source: The <top>, <right>, <bottom>, and <left> values may be either a <length> or auto. If any side's value is auto, the element is clipped to that side's inside border edge.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <top> ， <right> ， <bottom> ，和 <left> 值可以是 <length> 或 auto 。如果任一边的值为 auto ，则元素将被裁剪到该边的内部border edge。

trans-unit.source: The <transform-function> data type is specified using one of the transformation functions listed below. Each function applies a geometric operation in either 2D or 3D.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <transform-function> 数据类型是使用下面列出的变换函数之一指定。每个功能都以2D或3D形式应用几何运算。

trans-unit.source: The <transform-function>CSSdata type represents a transformation that affects an element's appearance. Transformation functions can rotate, resize, distort, or move an element in 2D or 3D space. It is used in the transform property.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <transform-function> CSS 数据类型表示影响的元件的外观的变换。变换功能可以在2D或3D空间中旋转，调整大小，扭曲或移动元素。它用于 transform 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <url> data type is specified using the url() functional notation. It may be written without quotes, or surrounded by single or double quotes. Relative URLs are allowed, and are relative to the URL of the stylesheet (not to the URL of the web page).
trans-unit.target: 所述 <url> 数据类型使用指定的 url() 函数表示法。它可以不带引号或以单引号或双引号引起来。相对URL是允许的，并且相对于样式表的URL（而不是网页的URL）。

trans-unit.source: The <url>CSSdata type denotes a pointer to a resource, such as an image or a font. URLs can be used in numerous CSS properties, such as background-image, cursor, and list-style.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <url> CSS 数据类型表示一个指针指向一个资源，诸如图像或字体。URL可以用于许多CSS属性中，例如 background-image ， cursor 和 list-style 。

trans-unit.source: The * and / operators do not require whitespace, but adding it for consistency is both allowed and recommended.
trans-unit.target: 在 * 和 / 运营商不需要的空白，但增加它的一致性允许和建议。

trans-unit.source: The + and - operators must be surrounded by whitespace. For instance, calc(50% -8px) will be parsed as a percentage followed by a negative length — an invalid expression — while calc(50% - 8px) is a percentage followed by a subtraction operator and a length. Likewise, calc(8px + -50%) is treated as a length followed by an addition operator and a negative percentage.
trans-unit.target: 在 + 和 - 运营商必须用空格包围。例如， calc(50% -8px) 将被解析为百分比，然后是负长度（无效表达式），而 calc(50% - 8px) 是一个百分比，其后是减法运算符和一个长度。同样，将 calc(8px + -50%) 视为长度，后跟加法运算符和负百分比。

trans-unit.source: The + combinator selects adjacent siblings. This means that the second element directly follows the first, and both share the same parent.
trans-unit.target: 的 + 组合子选择相邻的兄弟姐妹。这意味着第二个元素直接跟随第一个元素，并且它们共享相同的父元素。

trans-unit.source: The -moz-appearance CSS property is used in Gecko (Firefox) to display an element using platform-native styling based on the operating system's theme.
trans-unit.target: 该 -moz-appearance 的CSS属性在蛤蚧（火狐）用于显示使用基于操作系统的主题平台的原生样式的元素。

trans-unit.source: The -moz-appearance property may be specified as a single value chosen from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 -moz-appearance 属性指定为从下面的列表中选择的单个值。

trans-unit.source: The -moz-binding CSS property is used by Mozilla-based applications to attach an XBL binding to a DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 -moz-binding CSS属性用于通过基于Mozilla的应用程序附上一个XBL结合到DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: The -moz-device-pixel-ratio Gecko-only CSSmedia feature can be used to apply styles based on the number of device pixels per CSS pixel.
trans-unit.target: 所述 -moz-device-pixel-ratio Gecko的仅CSS 媒体功能可用于应用根据每个CSS像素装置的像素的数量的样式。

trans-unit.source: The -moz-force-broken-image-icon extended CSS property can be used to force the broken image icon to be shown even when a broken image has an alt attribute.
trans-unit.target: 所述 -moz-force-broken-image-icon 扩展CSS属性可用于强制破碎图像图标即使当断图像具有要显示 alt 属性。

trans-unit.source: The -moz-image-rect value for CSSbackground-image lets you use a portion of a larger image as a background. This allows you to, for example, use different parts of one larger image as backgrounds in different parts of your content.
trans-unit.target: CSS background-image 的 -moz-image-rect 值使您可以使用较大图像的一部分作为背景。例如，这允许您将一个较大图像的不同部分用作内容不同部分的背景。

trans-unit.source: The -moz-mac-graphite-theme Gecko-only CSSmedia feature can be used to apply styles based on whether the user has the Mac OS X "Graphite" theme enabled.
trans-unit.target: 该 -moz-mac-graphite-theme 壁虎只CSS 媒体功能可用于应用基于用户是否有Mac OS X的“石墨”的主题风格启用。
